khorne.description: One of the Ruinous Powers, the Blood God's domains are acts of violence, murder, and brutality.

kinetic.name: KINETIC
kinetic.description: A psychic power that manifests kinetic force to move something in realspace.

kommando.name: KOMMANDO
kommando.description: [AI-Generated] Ork specialists in stealth and infiltration — at least by Ork standards — who employ crude camouflage and ambush tactics to surprise their enemies.

krieg.name: KRIEG
krieg.description: [AI-Generated] Soldiers of the Death Korps of Krieg, fanatically devoted to the Emperor and willing to accept enormous casualties without hesitation in pursuit of atonement for their world's past heresy.

kroot.name: KROOT
kroot.description: A mercenary xenos Species with the ability to control their evolution through the consumption of other lifeforms.

kroxigor.name: KROXIGOR
kroxigor.description: [AI-Generated] Massive, powerful Seraphon creatures that serve as heavy labour and shock troops, towering over Saurus and wielding immense weapons.

las.name: LAS
las.description: Mass-produced, easily maintained, and fueled by rechargeable power cells used to fire lasers, Las weapons are the mainstay weapon of the Imperium.

league.name: [LEAGUE]
league.description: [AI-Generated] A League of Votann is a large coalition of Kin Holds united by common interests, traditions, and Ancestor Cores. Each League has its own culture and approach to warfare and trade.

leagues_of_votann.name: LEAGUES OF VOTANN
leagues_of_votann.description: [AI-Generated] An ancient civilisation of cloned abhumans known as the Kin, who dwell in the galactic core. Their society is organised into Leagues, guided by ancient machine intelligences called Ancestor Cores.

legio_cybernetica.name: LEGIO CYBERNETICA
legio_cybernetica.description: [AI-Generated] A division of the Adeptus Mechanicus that controls battle-automata — powerful robotic war machines guided by doctrina wafers and the rites of the Machine God.

legion.name: [LEGION]
legion.description: The Traitor Legions of the Chaos Space Marines each worship the Chaos Gods differently, but all are foul renegades. Some are many thousands in strength, others mere warbands united by a common goal, scattered through the galaxy and the nightmare Immaterium. Examples: Black Legion, Death Guard, Word Bearers.

lesser_daemon.name: LESSER DAEMON
lesser_daemon.description: [AI-Generated] The rank-and-file daemons of the Chaos Gods, lesser daemons are numerous and form the bulk of daemonic incursions into realspace.

librarian_keyword.name: LIBRARIAN
librarian_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] A Space Marine psyker who serves as a battle-brother, scholar, and keeper of their Chapter's lore, wielding psychic powers in service of the Emperor.

light_keyword.name: LIGHT
light_keyword.description: As a Wargear Keyword: A particularly low-weight piece of equipment. As a Psychic Power Keyword: A psychic power that produces light.

logos_historica_verita.name: LOGOS HISTORICA VERITA
logos_historica_verita.description: [AI-Generated] A secretive Imperial organisation dedicated to uncovering and preserving the true history of the Imperium, often operating at the fringes of sanctioned knowledge.

luminen.name: LUMINEN
luminen.description: [AI-Generated] Adeptus Mechanicus weapons powered by the wielder's internal electrical charge.

mandrake.name: MANDRAKE
mandrake.description: [AI-Generated] Mysterious shadow-dwelling creatures of Commorragh that can meld with darkness and strike from the shadows, trading their services as assassins in exchange for the suffering of others.

mark_of_chaos.name: [MARK OF CHAOS]
mark_of_chaos.description: Those that worship the Ruinous Powers may be gifted with a Mark of Chaos, a foul manifestation of the favor of the Dark Gods that defines a mortal as a servant of Chaos. Most of these traitors are marked with the eight-pointed star of Chaos undivided, but some focus their worship on a single god and in turn receive their specific mark.

mark_of_khorne.name: MARK OF KHORNE
mark_of_khorne.description: [AI-Generated] The brand of the Blood God, bestowed upon those who have earned Khorne's favour through acts of violence and bloodshed.

mark_of_khorne_bracket.name: [MARK OF KHORNE]
mark_of_khorne_bracket.description: [AI-Generated] The specific Mark of Chaos granted by Khorne, the Blood God. A bracketed keyword indicating a specific implementation of [MARK OF CHAOS].

mark_of_nurgle.name: MARK OF NURGLE
mark_of_nurgle.description: [AI-Generated] The brand of the Plague God, bestowed upon those who have embraced Nurgle's gifts of disease, decay, and endurance.

mark_of_slaanesh.name: MARK OF SLAANESH
mark_of_slaanesh.description: [AI-Generated] The brand of the Lord of Excess, bestowed upon those who have devoted themselves to Slaanesh's pursuit of sensation and perfection.

mark_of_tzeentch.name: MARK OF TZEENTCH
mark_of_tzeentch.description: [AI-Generated] One of the four Marks of Chaos, denoting dedication to Tzeentch, the Changer of Ways. Warriors bearing this mark are gifted with sorcerous abilities and mutations.

masque.name: [MASQUE]
masque.description: [AI-Generated] A Harlequin Masque is a troupe of Harlequins united under a common purpose, performing across the galaxy and fighting with deadly grace. Each Masque has its own mythic cycle and performance traditions.

masterclan.name: MASTERCLAN
masterclan.description: [AI-Generated] The ruling council of the Hrud, consisting of the most cunning and powerful leaders.

mek.name: MEK
mek.description: [AI-Generated] An Ork with an innate talent for building and maintaining machinery, Mekboyz construct everything from crude shootas to massive Stompas using salvaged parts and intuition.

melta.name: MELTA
melta.description: Firing focused beams of extreme heat, these thermal firearms are powered by sub-atomic technology and make excellent anti-armour weapons.

militarum_auxilla.name: MILITARUM AUXILLA
militarum_auxilla.description: A division of the Astra Militarum that consists of Abhumans.

militarum_tempestus.name: MILITARUM TEMPESTUS
militarum_tempestus.description: A division of the Astra Militarum that provides elite special operations soldiers.

militarum_traitoris.name: MILITARUM TRAITORIS
militarum_traitoris.description: [AI-Generated] Renegade regiments of the Astra Militarum that have turned to the service of the Ruinous Powers, bringing their military training and equipment to bear against the Imperium.

missile.name: MISSILE
missile.description: [AI-Generated] A launched explosive projectile, often with tracking or blast capability.

monofilament.name: MONOFILAMENT
monofilament.description: [AI-Generated] Aeldari weapons that utilise incredibly thin filaments to slice through targets with molecular precision.

monster.name: MONSTER
monster.description: [AI-Generated] A large and powerful creature that dominates the battlefield through sheer size, strength, and ferocity.

moulder.name: MOULDER
moulder.description: [AI-Generated] A Hrud clan specialising in the breeding and mutation of beasts for use in warfare.

mutant.name: MUTANT
mutant.description: Humans that have deviated from the pure, Ecclesiarchy-defined form due to the malign influence of the Warp are known as Mutants.

navigator_house.name: [NAVIGATOR HOUSE]
navigator_house.description: [AI-Generated] A player's choice of Navigator House — one of the noble families of the Navis Nobilite that possess the hereditary ability to navigate the Warp.

navis_imperialis.name: NAVIS IMPERIALIS
navis_imperialis.description: The Imperial organisation responsible for the operation and application of voidships. The Navis Imperialis, or Imperial Navy, ferry the Astra Militarum from one of a million battles to another, and engage in void combat with the many spacefaring enemies of the Imperium.

navis_nobilite.name: NAVIS NOBILITE
navis_nobilite.description: An ancient extended noble family of sanctioned Human mutants, all possessing the hereditary ability to navigate through the shifting tides of the Warp and guide a voidship through the seas of the Empyrean.

necron.name: NECRON
necron.description: A prehistoric Species of deathless robotic xenos that are returning to life after a multiple millennia of slumber. The Necrons employ technology beyond any other living Species in their quest to re-conquer the galaxy.

needle.name: NEEDLE
needle.description: These silent weapons have a two-stage firing mechanism: an invisible laser that penetrates the skin, followed by a poisonous crystalised needle of neurotoxin to ruthlessly dispatch foes at a distance.

nob.name: NOB
nob.description: [AI-Generated] A larger, tougher Ork who has risen to a position of authority through violence, serving as a squad leader and enforcer among smaller Boyz.

noble_keyword.name: NOBLE
noble_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] A Necron of high rank within their dynasty's hierarchy, commanding legions of warriors and wielding authority over their tomb world.

nurgle.name: NURGLE
nurgle.description: One of the Ruinous Powers, the Plague God's domains are disease, decay, and entropy.

officer.name: OFFICER
officer.description: [AI-Generated] A military commander who leads troops in battle, issuing orders and coordinating tactical operations.

officio_assassinorum.name: OFFICIO ASSASSINORUM
officio_assassinorum.description: A clandestine Imperial organisation that trains the deadliest assassins available to Humanity.

officio_medicae.name: OFFICIO MEDICAE
officio_medicae.description: [AI-Generated] The Imperial organisation responsible for medical care and healthcare across the Imperium. Its members serve as battlefield medics, chirurgeons, and physicians.

officio_prefectus.name: OFFICIO PREFECTUS
officio_prefectus.description: The Imperial organisation that recruits and trains Commissars.

order.name: [ORDER]
order.description: The convents of the Adepta Sororitas train righteous servants of the God-Emperor to serve many roles, each known as an Order.

ordo.name: [ORDO]
ordo.description: The Inquisition comprises multiple Holy Ordos, each specialised to clandestinely combat the greatest threats to the Imperium.

ordo_hereticus.name: ORDO HERETICUS
ordo_hereticus.description: [AI-Generated] One of the three major Ordos of the Inquisition, dedicated to hunting heretics, witches, and rogue psykers within the Imperium.

ordo_malleus.name: ORDO MALLEUS
ordo_malleus.description: [AI-Generated] The Ordo Malleus is the branch of the Inquisition dedicated to combating the daemonic threat. Its Inquisitors specialise in hunting daemons and rooting out Chaos corruption.

ordo_xenos.name: ORDO XENOS
ordo_xenos.description: [AI-Generated] One of the three major Ordos of the Inquisition, dedicated to studying and combating the alien threats that assail the Imperium.

ork.name: ORK
ork.description: A brutal xenos Species that crave violence and live only for war.

pain_engine.name: PAIN ENGINE
pain_engine.description: [AI-Generated] A grotesque Drukhari war construct created by the Haemonculi, animated by the agonised spirits of tortured victims and bristling with instruments of pain.

pariah.name: PARIAH
pariah.description: [AI-Generated] A psychic blank — an individual with no presence in the Warp. Pariahs cause unease in normal humans and agony in psykers, making them invaluable anti-psyker assets.

pathfinder_keyword.name: PATHFINDER
pathfinder_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] A T'au Fire Caste scout and reconnaissance specialist who operates ahead of the main force, marking targets with markerlights and gathering intelligence.

pestilens.name: PESTILENS
pestilens.description: [AI-Generated] A Hrud clan devoted to spreading plague and disease as a form of worship and warfare.

phaeron.name: PHAERON
phaeron.description: [AI-Generated] The supreme ruler of a Necron dynasty, a Phaeron commands absolute authority over all Necrons within their domain.

phase_blade.name: PHASE BLADE
phase_blade.description: [AI-Generated] A blade that can shift partially out of realspace, allowing it to bypass physical defences.

phoenix_lord.name: PHOENIX LORD
phoenix_lord.description: [AI-Generated] The legendary founders of the Asuryani Aspect Shrines, Phoenix Lords are immortal warriors whose spirits are preserved in their armour, reborn through each successor who dons it.

phosphex.name: PHOSPHEX
phosphex.description: [AI-Generated] Rare and horrific incendiary munitions that burn with an almost sentient hunger, consuming everything they touch.

phosphor.name: PHOSPHOR
phosphor.description: [AI-Generated] Adeptus Mechanicus weapons that fire blazing rounds of white-hot phosphor that mark targets and burn fiercely.

pilot_keyword.name: PILOT
pilot_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] An operator of a vehicle, aircraft, or battlesuit.

plasma.name: PLASMA
plasma.description: Advanced firearms that shoot deadly pulses of superheated matter, these weapons revered for their destructive prowess and feared for their instability.

power_field_keyword.name: POWER FIELD
power_field_keyword.description: Melee weapons sheathed in matter-disrupting power fields cut through armour with ease.

powered.name: POWERED
powered.description: Ceramite, adamantium, and plasteel are but a few of the super-heavy materials used to provide Imperial warriors with protection against the myriad threats of the 41st Millennium. This armour would be too heavy to use were it not for the electrically motivated fibre bundles that enhance and replicate the wearer's movements, mitigating heavy weight and increasing the strength of the wearer. Armour that can increase its wearer's strength in this way is known as Powered Armour, or Power Armour.

priest.name: PRIEST
priest.description: [AI-Generated] A religious leader or holy warrior who channels faith into righteous fury. Priests may serve the Imperial Creed, the Machine God, or other devotions.

primarch.name: PRIMARCH
primarch.description: [AI-Generated] One of the twenty genetically-engineered sons of the Emperor, each created to lead a Space Marine Legion. Some remain loyal, while others have fallen to Chaos.

primaris.name: PRIMARIS
primaris.description: A new breed of transhuman Space Marines, more powerful even that their Adeptus Astartes brethren.

projectile.name: PROJECTILE
projectile.description: A firearm that uses ancient gunpowder technology to launch simple metal slugs at high speeds.

psychic_keyword.name: PSYCHIC
psychic_keyword.description: A Keyword attached to every Psychic Power.

psyker.name: PSYKER
psyker.description: You are a Psyker, capable of channeling the raw energies of the Warp. If you have this Keyword, you: Know the Universal Psyker Abilities. Can spend XP to learn psychic powers. Can spend XP to improve your Psychic Mastery Skill. None truly know how an individual becomes a Psyker. Some are born with this twisted gift, others are cursed through exposure to the Warp. Becoming a Psyker will dramatically change your character, making them a powerful, feared, and potentially illegal citizen of the Imperium. Talk to your GM and your group before choosing this Keyword.

questor_mechanicus.name: QUESTOR MECHANICUS
questor_mechanicus.description: The robotic combat walkers known as Imperial Knights are referred to as Questor Mechanicus in High Gothic. Laying ancient claim to the feudal Knight Worlds of the Imperium, a single Knight can turn the tide of a battle using the millennia of combat knowledge passed down through the Throne Mechanicum.

raider_keyword.name: RAIDER
raider_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] A fast, lightly-armoured vehicle designed for rapid assault and hit-and-run tactics.

ranger_keyword.name: RANGER
ranger_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] An Asuryani outcast who has left the structured life of a Craftworld to wander the galaxy, often serving as a scout and sniper on the fringes of Aeldari society.

raven_guard.name: RAVEN GUARD
raven_guard.description: [AI-Generated] A First Founding Space Marine Chapter specialising in covert operations, guerrilla warfare, and striking from the shadows.

red_corsairs.name: RED CORSAIRS
red_corsairs.description: [AI-Generated] A powerful Chaos warband of renegade Space Marines led by Huron Blackheart, operating from the Maelstrom as pirates and raiders.

regiment.name: [REGIMENT]
regiment.description: Each of the diverse planets of the Imperium owe a tithe of warriors to the Emperor to fight His holy wars. The tremendous variety of planets — from jungle-covered Death Worlds to honourable industrial worlds — mean that every planetary Regiment is vastly different in training, technique, and equipment.

robot.name: ROBOT
robot.description: [AI-Generated] An autonomous or semi-autonomous mechanical construct used for warfare or labour, typically controlled by programming or the rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

rogue_trader.name: ROGUE TRADER
rogue_trader.description: The Holders of Warrants of Trade, Rogue Traders are empowered to explore, conquer, and trade beyond the borders of the Imperium to expand the Emperor's realm.

rubricae.name: RUBRICAE
rubricae.description: [AI-Generated] Rubric Marines of the Thousand Sons — once living warriors, now empty suits of power armour animated by sorcery after the Rubric of Ahriman destroyed their souls.

runt.name: RUNT
runt.description: [AI-Generated] The smallest and weakest of the Orkoid species, Runts include Snotlings and other diminutive creatures used for menial tasks.

runtherd.name: RUNTHERD
runtherd.description: [AI-Generated] An Ork who specialises in herding and controlling Gretchin and other Runts, using grabba sticks and squig hounds to keep their charges in line.

runts.name: RUNTS
runts.description: [AI-Generated] The smallest and weakest of Orkoid creatures, such as Gretchin and Snotlings, who serve as menial labourers and cannon fodder for larger Orks.

saedath.name: [SAEDATH]
saedath.description: [AI-Generated] A Harlequin Saedath is a grand narrative performance and strategic battle plan combined, each representing a different mythic cycle that defines the troupe's fighting style.

salamanders_chapter.name: SALAMANDERS
salamanders_chapter.description: [AI-Generated] A First Founding Space Marine Chapter known for their affinity with fire and forge-craft, their close ties to the civilian population, and their jet-black skin and glowing red eyes.

saurus.name: SAURUS
saurus.description: [AI-Generated] The warrior caste of the Seraphon, Saurus are powerful reptilian fighters bred for combat and fiercely loyal to their Slann masters.

sautekh.name: SAUTEKH
sautekh.description: [AI-Generated] One of the most powerful Necron dynasties, ruled by the Silent King Szarekh's chosen regent, known for their aggressive expansion and military might.

scholastia_psykana.name: SCHOLASTIA PSYKANA
scholastia_psykana.description: A division of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica, the Scholastia Psykana are tasked with examining the Psykers that are brought to Terra by the Black Ships and training them to determine their usefulness to the Imperium.

scum.name: SCUM
scum.description: The dregs of Imperial society operating outside of other Factions, and often the law.

sept.name: [SEPT]
sept.description: [AI-Generated] A T'au Sept is a colonial territory of the T'au Empire, centred around a major world. Each Sept has its own distinct culture, military doctrine, and role within the wider Empire.

seraphon.name: SERAPHON
seraphon.description: [AI-Generated] Ancient reptilian xenos resembling lizardmen, the Seraphon are guided by their enigmatic Slann leaders and possess powerful psychic abilities.

serberys.name: SERBERYS
serberys.description: [AI-Generated] Skitarii cavalry mounted on cybernetic steeds, used by the Adeptus Mechanicus for reconnaissance and rapid assault.

servitor.name: SERVITOR
servitor.description: AI, or Abominable Intelligence, is a sin to the Cult Mechanicus. Their many technological servants, known as Servitors, are all constructed around biological brains supplemented with holy mechanisms.

shade_runner.name: SHADE RUNNER
shade_runner.description: [AI-Generated] A Drukhari warrior specialising in rapid hit-and-run tactics using specialised wargear such as skyboards and blink packs.

shield_host.name: [SHIELD HOST]
shield_host.description: [AI-Generated] A Shield Host is a military formation of the Adeptus Custodes, each specialising in a particular aspect of the Emperor's defence.

shrouded.name: SHROUDED
shrouded.description: [AI-Generated] A creature or warrior concealed by darkness, stealth technology, or supernatural shadow, difficult to detect or target.

shuriken.name: SHURIKEN
shuriken.description: The advanced technology of the Aeldari allows them to construct monomolecular plasti-crystal ammunition that slices through flesh and armour when fired. These weapons usually utilise gravitic pulses to launch Shurikens at speeds so fast they screech through the air.

skink.name: SKINK
skink.description: [AI-Generated] A small, agile Seraphon species that serves as scouts, artisans, and skirmishers, supporting the larger Saurus warriors.

skitarii.name: SKITARII
skitarii.description: The heavily augmented Humans known as Skitarii are the eternally devoted mechanised armies of the Cult Mechanicus.

skryre.name: SKRYRE
skryre.description: [AI-Generated] A Hrud clan specialising in the creation of unstable and dangerous technology, blending science with Warp-tainted innovation.

slaanesh.name: SLAANESH
slaanesh.description: One of the Ruinous Powers, the Lord of Excess — or to the Aeldari, She Who Thirsts — claims domain over decadence, hedonism, and the pursuit of perfection.

slann.name: SLANN
slann.description: [AI-Generated] The ancient and powerful psychic leaders of the Seraphon, Slann are among the oldest beings in the galaxy and guide their species through visions and sorcery.

slaugth.name: SLAUGTH
slaugth.description: [AI-Generated] A horrifying xenos species composed of writhing maggot-like organisms that form a collective intelligence, known for their infiltration of human society and consumption of neural tissue.

snakebite.name: SNAKEBITE
snakebite.description: [AI-Generated] An Ork Clan that rejects most technology in favour of natural toughness and beast-riding, Snakebites are the most feral and traditionalist of the Ork Clans.

snotling.name: SNOTLING
snotling.description: [AI-Generated] The smallest Orkoid creatures, Snotlings are tiny, dim-witted beings that swarm around in large groups, occasionally used as living projectiles or as tenders for fungus farms.

sonic.name: SONIC
sonic.description: [AI-Generated] Weapons that weaponise extreme sound waves to disorient or destroy targets.

space_wolves.name: SPACE WOLVES
space_wolves.description: [AI-Generated] A First Founding Space Marine Chapter from the death world of Fenris, known for their fierce independence, lupine gene-seed mutations, and rejection of the Codex Astartes.

speed_freek.name: SPEED FREEK
speed_freek.description: [AI-Generated] Orks obsessed with velocity who ride into battle on ramshackle vehicles, buggies, and bikes, believing that going faster makes them harder to hit.

spirit.name: SPIRIT
spirit.description: [AI-Generated] An Aeldari soul bound to a wraithbone construct, animating it with psychic energy to serve in battle or perform other functions.

splinter.name: SPLINTER
splinter.description: [AI-Generated] Drukhari weapons that fire shards of crystal laced with virulent toxins.

squig.name: SQUIG
squig.description: [AI-Generated] Ork weapons or equipment made from or involving Squigs, the bizarre fungal creatures that share the Ork ecosystem.

sslyth.name: SSLYTH
sslyth.description: [AI-Generated] Multi-limbed serpentine xenos mercenaries often found in the service of Drukhari Archons as loyal bodyguards.

striking_scorpion.name: STRIKING SCORPION
striking_scorpion.description: [AI-Generated] An Asuryani Aspect Warrior shrine devoted to close-quarters ambush tactics, equipped with chainswords, shuriken pistols, and mandiblasters.

synapse.name: SYNAPSE
synapse.description: [AI-Generated] Tyranid organisms that serve as psychic relay nodes for the Hive Mind, broadcasting its will to lesser bioforms and maintaining control over the swarm.

talons_of_the_emperor.name: TALONS OF THE EMPEROR
talons_of_the_emperor.description: [AI-Generated] The combined forces of the Adeptus Custodes and the Sisters of Silence, who together form the personal guardians of the Emperor of Mankind.

tank.name: TANK
tank.description: [AI-Generated] A heavily armoured vehicle designed to withstand enemy fire and deliver devastating firepower on the battlefield.

taser.name: TASER
taser.description: [AI-Generated] Adeptus Mechanicus weapons that deliver powerful electrical shocks on contact.

tau.name: T'AU
tau.description: A young but technologically advanced xenos Species, the T'au empire is rapidly spreading on the eastern fringes of the galaxy.

tau_auxiliaries.name: T'AU AUXILIARIES
tau_auxiliaries.description: [AI-Generated] Non-T'au species that have been incorporated into the T'au Empire and fight alongside Fire Caste warriors in the name of the Greater Good.

tau_empire.name: T'AU EMPIRE
tau_empire.description: [AI-Generated] The interstellar empire of the T'au, a rapidly expanding civilisation on the eastern fringes of the galaxy. The T'au Empire is organised into Septs and united by the philosophy of the Greater Good.

tau_sept.name: T'AU SEPT
tau_sept.description: [AI-Generated] The homeworld Sept of the T'au, and the most politically significant in the Empire.

telepathy.name: TELEPATHY
telepathy.description: A psychic power that allows the Psyker to enter the mind of another individual.

templum_adamus.name: TEMPLUM ADAMUS
templum_adamus.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum that trains the Execution Force's close combat specialists.

templum_callidus.name: TEMPLUM CALLIDUS
templum_callidus.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum specialising in infiltration, disguise, and polymorphine-assisted shapeshifting to eliminate targets from within.

templum_culexus.name: TEMPLUM CULEXUS
templum_culexus.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum that trains psychic blanks as anti-psyker assassins. Their mere presence causes terror and disrupts Warp energy.

templum_eversor.name: TEMPLUM EVERSOR
templum_eversor.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum that produces berserk killing machines, sustained by combat drugs and cybernetic augmentation to unleash indiscriminate destruction.

templum_vanus.name: TEMPLUM VANUS
templum_vanus.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum specialising in information warfare, data-manipulation, and eliminating targets through orchestrated events rather than direct violence.

templum_venenum.name: TEMPLUM VENENUM
templum_venenum.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum specialising in the use of poisons, toxins, and biological agents to eliminate targets.

templum_vindicare.name: TEMPLUM VINDICARE
templum_vindicare.description: [AI-Generated] A temple of the Officio Assassinorum that trains the deadliest long-range marksmen in the Imperium, capable of eliminating targets from extreme distances with a single shot.

terminator.name: TERMINATOR
terminator.description: [AI-Generated] A Space Marine equipped with Tactical Dreadnought Armour (Terminator Armour), providing immense protection and allowing the use of the heaviest weaponry.

tesla.name: TESLA
tesla.description: [AI-Generated] Necron weapons that fire arcs of living lightning that leap between nearby targets.

thousand_sons.name: THOUSAND SONS
thousand_sons.description: [AI-Generated] A Traitor Legion devoted to Tzeentch, the Changer of Ways. Once scholars and sorcerers, their ranks now include many automaton Rubric Marines, their souls destroyed by the Rubric of Ahriman.

toxin.name: TOXIN
toxin.description: [AI-Generated] A weapon or upgrade that incorporates poisonous substances to debilitate or kill targets.

transonic.name: TRANSONIC
transonic.description: [AI-Generated] Adeptus Mechanicus weapons whose blades vibrate at transonic frequencies, allowing them to phase through armour.

transport.name: TRANSPORT
transport.description: [AI-Generated] A vehicle designed to carry troops safely across the battlefield, providing protection and mobility.

triarch.name: TRIARCH
triarch.description: [AI-Generated] The ruling council of the Necron empire, the Triarch upholds the ancient codes and laws of the Necrontyr. Triarch Praetorians serve as enforcers of these codes across all dynasties.

two_handed.name: 2-HANDED
two_handed.description: A weapon that requires two hands to wield.

tyranid.name: TYRANID
tyranid.description: An extra-galactic gestalt Species of grotesque xenos solely intent on devouring all other life. Though they appear as multiple adaptive bioforms (including the dreaded Genestealers) they operate as a Hive Mind, deadly and singular in purpose and fighting with disgusting bio-tech weaponry.

tzaangor.name: TZAANGOR
tzaangor.description: [AI-Generated] Beastmen specifically mutated and blessed by Tzeentch, serving as savage warriors and sorcerous foot soldiers for the Thousand Sons.

tzeentch.name: TZEENTCH
tzeentch.description: One of the Ruinous Powers, the Changer of Ways' domains are fate, ambition, and sorcery.

ulthwe.name: ULTHWE
ulthwe.description: [AI-Generated] An Asuryani Craftworld situated near the Eye of Terror, renowned for its powerful psykers and the Black Guardians who defend it against the constant Chaos threat.

ultramarines.name: ULTRAMARINES
ultramarines.description: [AI-Generated] A First Founding Space Marine Chapter, paragons of discipline and adherence to the Codex Astartes, who rule the stellar realm of Ultramar.

undead.name: UNDEAD
undead.description: [AI-Generated] A creature that has been reanimated after death through sorcery, technology, or Warp energy.

undivided.name: UNDIVIDED
undivided.description: [AI-Generated] Followers of Chaos who worship the Ruinous Powers as a pantheon rather than devoting themselves to a single Chaos God.

vehicle.name: VEHICLE
vehicle.description: [AI-Generated] A crewed or autonomous machine used for transportation and combat on the battlefield.

vespid.name: VESPID
vespid.description: [AI-Generated] An insectoid xenos species allied to the T'au Empire, the Vespid are winged warriors equipped with neutron blasters who serve as fast-moving auxiliaries.

veteran.name: VETERAN
veteran.description: [AI-Generated] An experienced soldier who has survived many campaigns and earned distinction through long service and proven combat skill.

viorla.name: VIOR'LA
viorla.description: [AI-Generated] A T'au Sept known for producing aggressive and hot-blooded warriors, often at the forefront of the Empire's military campaigns.

vortex.name: VORTEX
vortex.description: [AI-Generated] Aeldari weapons that tear open holes in the fabric of realspace, exposing anything nearby to the destructive energies of the Warp.

water_caste.name: WATER CASTE
water_caste.description: [AI-Generated] The diplomat and merchant caste of the T'au Empire, responsible for trade, negotiation, and communication with alien species.

weirdboy.name: WEIRDBOY
weirdboy.description: [AI-Generated] An Ork psyker who channels the collective psychic energy of nearby Orks, unleashing it in devastating and unpredictable blasts of Waaagh! energy.

white_scars.name: WHITE SCARS
white_scars.description: [AI-Generated] A First Founding Space Marine Chapter renowned for their lightning-fast mobile warfare, drawn from the warrior traditions of their homeworld Chogoris.

world_eaters.name: WORLD EATERS
world_eaters.description: [AI-Generated] A Traitor Legion devoted to Khorne, the Blood God. Driven mad by the Butcher's Nails implants, the World Eaters live only for slaughter and bloodshed.

wraith_construct.name: WRAITH CONSTRUCT
wraith_construct.description: Every Asuryani carries a Spirit Stone, a device that will capture their soul when they die to protect it from the predations of She Who Thirsts. These Spirit Stones can be attached to wraithbone technology, powering it with the nascent psychic ability of the Aeldari soul. A Wraith Construct is an artificial body that can be powered by a Spirit Stone, allowing a semblance of life beyond death.

wraithguard.name: WRAITHGUARD
wraithguard.description: [AI-Generated] Asuryani Wraith Constructs piloted by the spirits of the dead, armed with devastating wraithcannons or D-scythes that tear holes in the fabric of reality.

wrecka.name: WRECKA
wrecka.description: [AI-Generated] An Ork unit or vehicle specialising in demolition and destruction, equipped with heavy close-combat weapons to tear apart enemy fortifications and armour.

wych_cult.name: [WYCH CULT]
wych_cult.description: The Drukhari of Commorragh flock to the nightly gladiatorial murder-shows of the Wych Cults for sustinence. They relish the displays of violence and pain as literal nourishment for their depraved souls. Each Cult uses different techniques, combat drugs, and weaponry to perform glorious slaughter. Examples: Cult of Strife, Cult of the Cursed Blade, Cult of the Red Grief.

wych_cult_keyword.name: WYCH CULT
wych_cult_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] When used as an unbracketed keyword on wargear, indicates equipment associated with Drukhari Wych Cults.

wych_keyword.name: WYCH
wych_keyword.description: [AI-Generated] A Drukhari gladiatorial fighter who performs in the arenas of Commorragh and fights in realspace raids, combining lethal acrobatics with exotic combat drugs.

xenos.name: XENOS
xenos.description: [AI-Generated] A broad classification for all alien species, used by the Imperium to denote any non-Human life form.

xv88.name: XV88
xv88.description: [AI-Generated] A T'au heavy battlesuit designation, the XV88 Broadside is a fire-support platform equipped with devastating long-range weaponry.

ynnari.name: YNNARI
ynnari.description: A recently emerging religious sub-faction of the Aeldari, the Ynnari seek to unite the Asuryani, Drukhari, Harlequins, and Outcasts. Their ultimate mission is to awaken Ynnead, the Aeldari God of the Dead, so that they may defeat She Who Thirsts and reclaim their position as rulers of the galaxy.

bulk.name: Bulk
bulk.description: Heavy and restrictive armour possesses the Bulk trait. Bulk reduces the Speed of the wearer by a number of metres equal to its rating.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: Large suits of armour can severely restrict movement. You cannot Run or Sprint in Cumbersome armour.

powered.name: Powered
powered.description: This armour is designed to augment the wearer's might through the marvels of mechanisation. Whilst wearing armour with this Trait you gain a Strength bonus equal to the rating. Additionally, you are not knocked Prone when you roll a Complication while firing an unsecured Heavy weapon.

power_field_armor.name: Power Field
power_field_armor.description: Wonders of archeotech, personal Power Fields envelope their user in a protective barrier of energy. Armour with this Trait allows you to roll Determination against attacks that deal Mortal Wounds.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Wielded like a defensive weapon, shields are carried instead of worn, and used to deflect incoming attacks. Armour with this Trait adds its AR to your Defence and Resilience, provided the GM agrees you can manoeuvre the shield to block the attack.

invulnerable.name: Invulnerable
invulnerable.description: Any Armour Rating marked with an asterisk (*) is Invulnerable. If you are wearing Invulnerable Armour, AP does not affect your Resilience.

ere_we_go.name: 'Ere We Go
ere_we_go.description: The latent psychic power of an Ork empowers their armour, allowing them to fight harder when harmed. An Ork wearing armour with this Trait ignores the Bulk and Cumbersome Traits when Wounded.

fear_armor.name: Fear
fear_armor.description: Armour that inspires terror in onlookers. Enemies that can see the wearer must pass a Fear Test with a DN equal to the rating.

agonising.name: Agonising
agonising.description: Designed to inflict maximum pain, these weapons damage mind and morale as much as body. Every Wound inflicted by an Agonising weapon also inflicts 1 Shock.

arc.name: Arc
arc.description: The deadly electrical discharge of Arc weapons scrambles vehicle technology. Arc weapons gain +ED equal to their rating when you use them to attack a vehicle.

assault.name: Assault
assault.description: Optimised for firing whilst rushing righteously towards the enemy. You can fire an Assault weapon as part of a Sprint, but take a +2 DN penalty to the attack.

blessed.name: Blessed
blessed.description: Anointed in the holiest of oils and prayers by the priests of the Ecclesiarchy to bring righteous fury to creatures both spawned or tainted by the Immaterium. Weapons that are blessed gain +ED equal to their rating against targets with the PSYKER or DAEMON Keyword.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Explosive weapons can devastate multiple enemies with a single attack. When you fire or throw a Blast weapon, choose any point in range (including another character!), then make a DN 3 Ballistic Skill (A) Test. Apply Range effects as normal unless you are using a thrown weapon like a grenade. If you fail the Test, the attack misses and Scatters. If you succeed, the explosion is centered on your target. If you are measuring distance, the Blast rating determines the radius of the explosion in metres. Anyone inside this radius is hit by the attack. If you are targeting a Mob or using a simplified theater of the mind approach, the number of nearby individuals hit by the explosive is equal to half the Blast rating. You cannot Shift to increase the damage of a Blast weapon. If you inflict a Critical Hit with a Blast weapon, the effects apply to all targets hit by the attack.

brutal.name: Brutal
brutal.description: Brutal weapons inflict appalling, traumatic wounds. When you roll Extra Damage Dice for a Brutal weapon: Results of 1 and 2 inflict 0 Damage. Results of 3 and 4 inflict 1 Damage. Results of 5 and 6 inflict 2 Damage.

flamer.name: Flamer
flamer.description: Flamers spew a stream of burning chemical liquid. The flowing torrent of flame can be guided by the wielder of a Flamer to set multiple foes ablaze. Attacks made with a Flamer ignore cover. If you hit a target with a Flamer, blazing liquid fills the space between you and your target in a straight line. Anything in that line is also hit by the attack. You can Shift when you make a ranged attack Test with a Flamer to arc the stream of burning chemicals a number of metres equal to your Ballistic Skill Rating. Anything in this arc is hit by the attack. Whenever you hit multiple targets, roll damage once and apply that damage to all targets. Any target may attempt to reduce the damage using the rules for Dodging Area Effect Attacks. A weapon with the Flamer Trait is considered to have the Inflict (On Fire) Trait.

force.name: Force
force.description: Psykers can channel the power of the Warp through the etheric circuit patterns and psycho-reactive materials of these weapons. If you have the PSYKER Keyword, you may add half of your (Wil) Rating to a Force weapon's Damage Value. If you don't have the PSYKER Keyword, a Force weapon's damage is decreased by 2.

gruesome.name: Gruesome
gruesome.description: Drukhari weapons, especially Haemonculus weapons, don't merely kill, they torture the target and terrify onlookers to feed the Drukhari soul debt. Weapons with the Gruesome Trait cause a DN 3 Fear Test for the target and allies within 10m on a Wrath Critical.

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: Large and cumbersome weapons are difficult to wield accurately and effectively. You must have a Strength equal to the Heavy weapon's rating to fire it normally. All attacks with a Heavy weapon are made with a +2 DN penalty if you do not meet the minimum Strength, and rolling a Complication as part of an attack knocks you Prone in addition to any other effects. Taking the Brace Action or securing a Heavy weapon to something like a tripod negates the Heavy Trait.

inflict.name: Inflict
inflict.description: These weapons are designed to harm the target in cruel and unusual ways. Every Inflict weapon has a Condition that it imposes on the target if it deals a Wound. For example, if a weapon with Inflict (On Fire) deals a Wound to a target, the target is On Fire. If an Inflict weapon has a number, that number determines the DN of any Test made to remove the Condition. For example, if a weapon with Inflict (Poisoned 4) Wounds a target, they are Poisoned, and the target would need to make a DN 4 Toughness Test to recover at the beginning of their next turn.

kustom.name: Kustom
kustom.description: You can replace this weapon Trait with any other Weapon Trait of your choice when you acquire a weapon with this Trait. If the Trait you select has a Rating (X), roll 1d3 to determine the Rating.

lance.name: Lance
lance.description: Lance weapons blast targets with beams of concentrated energy. The vaporised mass fuelling the blast bores through the thickest armour. Weapons with the Lance Trait ignore the Invulnerable Armour trait. Lance weapons cause Mortal Wounds, and they always inflict 1 Mortal Wound even if it does not damage its target.

melta.name: Melta
melta.description: The sub-atomic bursts that spew from these weapons melt flesh and reduce armour to slag. When you roll Extra Damage Dice for a Melta weapon fired at Short Range: Results of 1 and 2 inflict 0 Damage. Results of 3 and 4 inflict 1 Damage. Results of 5 and 6 inflict 2 Damage. When you roll Extra Damage Dice for a Melta weapon fired against a vehicle or fortification at Short range: Results of 1, 2 and 3 inflict 1 Damage. Results of 4, 5 and 6 inflict 2 Damage.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: You can use these weapons to deflect blows. You gain +1 Defence against melee attacks while wielding a Parry weapon.

pistol.name: Pistol
pistol.description: Built light to be drawn quickly and used in close quarters. Pistols can be fired while Engaged.

rad.name: Rad
rad.description: The dangerous radioactive materials fired by these weapons irrevocably damage flesh. When you roll Extra Damage Dice for a Rad weapon, you add the Rating to the results of the dice.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.description: These weapons are capable of quickly unleashing a hail of death at close range. If you hit with a Rapid Fire weapon at Short Range, you gain Extra Damage Dice equal to the weapon's Rapid Fire rating.

reliable.name: Reliable
reliable.description: A rugged and easily maintained weapon. You can ignore the first Complication related to this weapon per scene. Tests made to repair or maintain Reliable weapons are made with +1 bonus die.

rending.name: Rending
rending.description: These powerful weapons punch through armour. When you Shift an Exalted Icon as part of an attack with a Rending weapon, the weapon's AP improves by the Rending rating for that attack.

silent.name: Silent
silent.description: These stealthy weapons are designed to deal damage as quietly as possible. When a weapon with this Trait is used as part of an attack, your Stealth Score is only reduced by 2.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Weapons optimised for high accuracy over long range. When you Aim with a Sniper weapon you gain an additional +1 bonus die to the attack, and gain +ED equal to the weapon's Sniper rating.

sonic_weapon.name: Sonic Weapon
sonic_weapon.description: [AI-Generated] These weapons use focused soundwaves to shatter and pulverise. They lose power over distance but affect a wider area as the wave expands. A Sonic Weapon gains +2 ED at Short range, and Spread at Medium or Long range.

spread.name: Spread
spread.description: These wide-bore weapons wreak havoc on closely packed combatants. When fired at Short Range, a Spread weapon can hit any number of targets as long as they are all within 3 metres of one another. When you fire a Spread Weapon at a Mob you gain +3 bonus dice.

supercharge.name: Supercharge
supercharge.description: The super-heated matter plasma weapons fire can be overcharged with undeniably deadly results for the target and, occasionally, the wielder. You can choose to fire a weapon with this Trait in Supercharge mode. If you roll a Complication, you take 1d6 Mortal Wounds. If you hit, the weapon deals an additional +3 ED.

two_handed.name: Two-Handed
two_handed.description: A weapon that requires two hands to wield.

unwieldy.name: Unwieldy
unwieldy.description: Whether unbalanced or too large, some weapons are harder to use. Attacks made with Unwieldy weapons have their DN increased by an amount equal to their Unwieldy rating.

waaagh.name: Waaagh!
waaagh.description: Ork weapons defy understanding; they break the laws of mechanics and physics, but a Greenskin's beliefs make them all the more deadly. If you are an Ork, you gain +1 bonus die to attacks with a WAAAGH! weapon. If you are also Wounded, you deal an extra +1 ED.

warp_weapon.name: Warp Weapon
warp_weapon.description: Powered by psychic energy, xenos technology, or the raw force of Chaos, few can face these ungodly weapons and emerge unharmed. A Warp Weapon has a Damage value equal to the target's Total Resilience -4, unless the weapon's listed Damage is higher.

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: An Attribute representing physical power and muscle. Strength is the linked Attribute for Athletics. It also contributes to melee damage with certain weapons.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.description: An Attribute representing physical resilience and endurance. Toughness contributes to Resilience, Determination, and Max Wounds.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: An Attribute representing quickness, coordination, and fine motor control. Agility is the linked Attribute for Ballistic Skill, Pilot, and Stealth.

initiative.name: Initiative
initiative.description: An Attribute representing reflexes and reaction speed. Initiative determines turn order in combat and contributes to Defence. It is the linked Attribute for Weapon Skill.

willpower.name: Willpower
willpower.description: An Attribute representing mental fortitude, discipline, and psychic potential. Willpower is the linked Attribute for Intimidation, Leadership, Psychic Mastery, and Survival. It contributes to Resolve, Conviction, and Max Shock.

intellect.name: Intellect
intellect.description: An Attribute representing mental acuity, knowledge, and reasoning. Intellect is the linked Attribute for Awareness, Investigation, Medicae, Scholar, and Tech.

fellowship.name: Fellowship
fellowship.description: An Attribute representing social aptitude, personal magnetism, and empathy. Fellowship is the linked Attribute for Cunning, Deception, Insight, and Persuasion. It contributes to Influence.

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: A Skill representing physical feats such as climbing, jumping, swimming, and throwing. Linked to Strength.

awareness.name: Awareness
awareness.description: A Skill representing perception and sensory acuity. Used to notice threats, find hidden objects, and detect ambushes. Linked to Intellect. Also contributes to Passive Awareness.

ballistic_skill.name: Ballistic Skill
ballistic_skill.description: A Skill representing ranged combat proficiency. Used for all ranged weapon attacks. Linked to Agility.

cunning.name: Cunning
cunning.description: A Skill representing streetwise knowledge and underhanded tactics. Used for criminal knowledge, finding contacts, and subtle manipulation. Linked to Fellowship.

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: A Skill representing the art of lying and misdirection. Used to bluff, disguise yourself, and mislead others. Linked to Fellowship.

insight.name: Insight
insight.description: A Skill representing the ability to read people and understand motivations. Used to detect lies, gauge moods, and resist Interaction Attacks. Linked to Fellowship.

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: A Skill representing coercion through force of personality or threat of violence. Used for Interaction Attacks and coercing information from others. Linked to Willpower.

investigation.name: Investigation
investigation.description: A Skill representing analytical examination and deduction. Used for searching scenes, conducting research, and piecing together clues. Linked to Intellect.

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: A Skill representing command and inspiration. Used to rally allies, give orders, coordinate actions, and remove Fear and Pinned conditions from comrades. Linked to Willpower.

medicae.name: Medicae
medicae.description: A Skill representing medical knowledge and healing ability. Used to treat Wounds, remove Conditions such as Bleeding and Poisoned, and perform surgery. Linked to Intellect.

persuasion.name: Persuasion
persuasion.description: A Skill representing the ability to convince others through argument and charm. Used for negotiations, diplomacy, and Interaction Attacks. Linked to Fellowship.

pilot.name: Pilot
pilot.description: A Skill representing the ability to control vehicles and aircraft. Used for driving, flying, and vehicle combat maneuvers. Linked to Agility.

psychic_mastery.name: Psychic Mastery
psychic_mastery.description: A Skill representing the ability to channel psychic power from the Warp. Required to manifest Psychic Powers. Only usable by characters with the PSYKER Keyword. Linked to Willpower.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.description: A Skill representing academic knowledge and lore. Used for recalling information, identifying objects, and understanding historical or scientific phenomena. Linked to Intellect.

stealth_skill.name: Stealth
stealth_skill.description: A Skill representing the ability to move unseen and unheard. Used for sneaking, hiding, and shadowing targets. Linked to Agility.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: A Skill representing endurance and wilderness expertise. Used for tracking, navigation, foraging, and resisting environmental hazards. Linked to Willpower.

tech.name: Tech
tech.description: A Skill representing technical knowledge and engineering ability. Used for repairing equipment, operating machinery, and understanding technology. Linked to Intellect.

weapon_skill.name: Weapon Skill
weapon_skill.description: A Skill representing melee combat proficiency. Used for all melee weapon attacks. Linked to Initiative.

defence.name: Defence
defence.description: Your ability to dodge blows and bullets; essentially how hard you are to hit. Your Defence is equal to your Initiative rating –1. When anyone makes an attack against you, their attack roll must equal or exceed your Defence to hit you. Defence is effectively the Difficulty Number of any attack roll.

resilience_trait.name: Resilience
resilience_trait.description: A representation of how well you can withstand injuries; the same attack might seriously injure one person and result in a minor flesh wound to another. Your base Resilience is your Toughness rating +1. If you are wearing any armour, add its Armour Rating to your base Resilience for your Total Resilience. When you get hit with an attack, you subtract your Resilience from any damage you take. Your enemies need to deal more damage than your Resilience when they attack in order to deal Wounds to you.

determination_trait.name: Determination
determination_trait.description: Your ability to continue acting despite the damage to your body, ignoring physical harm through force of will. Your Determination value is equal to your Toughness rating. Whenever you take one or more Wounds, you can choose to roll Determination to negate those Wounds at the cost of Shock.

max_wounds.name: Max Wounds
max_wounds.description: A measure of how many injuries you can suffer before you potentially die. Your Maximum Wounds Trait is equal to double your Tier plus your Toughness Rating. When your Wounds exceed your Maximum Wounds you are Dying.

max_shock.name: Max Shock
max_shock.description: A measure of how much mental trauma you can take before your will breaks. Your Maximum Shock is equal to your Willpower rating plus your Tier. You suffer Shock when you use Determination and when you are pushed to your psychological limits. When you suffer more Shock than your Maximum, you are Exhausted.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: A Trait representing how far you can move in metres during a Move Action. Determined primarily by species, typically 6 for most species. Running allows movement at double Speed, and Sprinting at triple Speed.

conviction.name: Conviction
conviction.description: Whenever you try to resist corruption or the forces of Chaos, you make a Corruption Test. When you make a Corruption Test, your dice pool is equal to your Conviction. Your starting Conviction is equal to your Willpower.

resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.description: Your courage and overall morale. Your starting Resolve is equal to your Willpower –1, with a minimum of 1. Resolve is used to resist Fear and other psychological conditions.

passive_awareness.name: Passive Awareness
passive_awareness.description: Your ability to notice the unusual and sense threats when you aren't actively searching your environment. Your Passive Awareness is equal to half your Awareness (Int) Skill total, rounded up if necessary.

influence.name: Influence
influence.description: A measure of your societal authority and reputation. When you are in a civilised environment you can make Influence Tests to exploit authority and acquire items. Your starting Influence is equal to your Fellowship –1. Unlike your Skills, Influence is only applicable when you are dealing within the social contract of civilisation.

wealth.name: Wealth
wealth.description: A measure of the valuable resources you own. You can use Wealth to purchase wargear and make bribes. Each point of Wealth could be a literal cache of Throne Gelt, the currency of the Imperium, or it could be something else of value; a piece of fine art, a xenos artefact, or some other rare oddity. Your starting Wealth is equal to your Tier and may be modified by your abilities or Talents.

corruption.name: Corruption
corruption.description: A Trait tracking your exposure to the forces of Chaos. Starts at 0 and increases from Warp exposure, daemonic contact, and other corrupting influences. High Corruption can lead to mental afflictions, physical mutations, and worse.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description:
Discipline: Universal
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 0
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 35m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You concentrate destructive power through the lens of your will, summoning lethal bolts of raw psychic energy that blast your enemies into ash. Target one enemy within range and make a Psychic Mastery (Wil) Test against their Defence. If successful, the target suffers 1d3 Mortal Wounds.

Potency: [3] +1 Mortal Wound.

chameleon.name: Chameleon
chameleon.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 5
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You bend reality just enough to cause your image to blend with your surroundings. While this power remains in effect, you gain +5 bonus dice to Stealth (A) Tests and +1 to your Defence against ranged attacks.

Potency: [1] Stealth (A) bonus increased by +1. [3] Additional +1 bonus to Defence.

compel.name: Compel
compel.description: Effect text should include: "Example commands include: 'drop the weapon,' 'open the door' or 'push him.' Suggestions cannot make a creature perform an action that they are simply incapable of performing — for example, you can't make a Cyber Mastiff work a cogitator."

conceal_phenomena.name: Conceal Phenomena
conceal_phenomena.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 3
XP Cost: 5
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You draw the dark energies of the Warp about your mind, cloaking your presence against those who may attempt to detect you via psychic means. If successful, you can resist attempts to locate you or identify you as a Psyker via powers such as Psyniscience. Any Psychic Mastery (Wil) Test made to detect you must be made with a +2 DN penalty.

Potency: [1] +1 to the DN for detection attempts.

invoke_luck.name: Invoke Luck
invoke_luck.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Simple Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You manipulate the energies of the Warp, perhaps without even consciously doing it, to make sure probabilities seem to favour you. You may choose to gain +1 bonus dice to one Test you make during the power's duration.

Potency: [1] You gain +1 bonus dice to the chosen Test.

inflict_pain.name: Inflict Pain
inflict_pain.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 5m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You draw upon the swirling energies of the Warp and pour them into the mind of your target, wracking them with debilitating pain. Choose a target within visual range. That target immediately takes 1d3 Shock and must make a successful DN 3 Willpower Test or is Staggered. As long as you sustain this power, the target must make the same Test again at the beginning of each of their Turns or be dealt another point of Shock and remain Staggered. If the target resists, they are immune to being Staggered by this power for the rest of the scene, but still takes Shock damage. Inflict Pain has no effect against targets that aren't truly alive (such as Daemons, plants, etc.).

Potency: [1] Additional +1 Shock damage per sustained Round.

conjure_flame.name: Conjure Flame
conjure_flame.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Movement
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You conjure a simple flame. This flame can vary in size, from as small as a match to as large as a crackling torch. This flame behaves in every way as real fire and can be used to ignite combustible materials. While the flame exists, you are immune to its effects, though you are not immune to the effects of fire from any other source (nor is your clothing or any items you're holding). When making a melee attack, this flame can be used as a weapon inflicting 8+1ED damage. At the GM's discretion, this can cause the On Fire condition.

Potency: [1] You generate an additional flame. [2] +1 ED damage.

dull_pain.name: Dull Pain
dull_pain.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Simple Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 5m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You use your force of will to desensitise others (or yourself) to pain. While this power remains in effect, the target reduces all Shock they suffer by 1.

Potency: [1] Shock reduced by a further 1. [3] Target reduces all Wounds they suffer by 1.

flash_bang.name: Flash Bang
flash_bang.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: AUDITORY, LIGHT, PSYCHIC

Effect: You mentally snap Warp energy like a whip, creating a bright flash and a sharp crack of sound. Everyone within range must make a successful DN 3 Toughness Test or take 1 Shock and be Blinded for 1 round.

Potency: [1] Additional +1 Shock. [2] Range increased by 5m.

subvert_machine.name: Subvert Machine
subvert_machine.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 25m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You reach into a specific machine or mechanism with your mind and cause it to temporarily cease functioning. A mechanism jammed with this power remains inoperable for one minute. The mechanism can be cleared and made operational during this time with a successful DN 3 Tech Test.

Potency: [1] Range increased by 25m. [1] Tech Test DN increased by +1.

hover.name: Hover
hover.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 7
Activation: Simple Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You use your force of will to unshackle your body from the constraints of gravity. You can float freely, hovering or moving slowly up or down (1/2 Speed). You are not able to truly fly, however, so must use some other means to move in any other direction. This power may be used to attempt to negate a fall.

Potency: [1]* May move at normal Speed up or down. [2] May also affect a willing creature within 5m. The Psyker controls their vertical movement.

psychic_torch.name: Psychic Torch
psychic_torch.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 2
XP Cost: 5
Activation: Simple Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 5m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You conjure a floating orb of glowing light. Though typically equal in intensity to a common lumen torch, you can cause it to become as dim as a candle or as bright as a flare through concentration. The orb typically floats in the air beside you, but with a mental command it can be given simple instructions such as to follow you, orbit your head, or to remain stationary at a specific location. The orb may move up to your Speed, but instantly dissipates if it passes out of range and must be re-summoned.

Potency: [1] Range is increased by 5m. [2] May create an additional orb.

phantom_grip.name: Phantom Grip
phantom_grip.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 4
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You manifest an invisible set of phantom hands within range. By using the appropriate action, you can use these hands to perform any number of tasks that they might do - push a button, open/close a door, pull the pin from a grenade, etc., though you must be able to see the object/target to be manipulated. For the purposes of these tasks, the Phantom Grip has a Strength and Agility equal to your Willpower. Phantom Grip can't be used to make an attack, but the GM may allow you to make an Interaction Attack using a dice pool equal to your Willpower.

Potency: [1]* Activation reduced to an Action. [1] Range increased by 10m.

mental_force.name: Mental Force
mental_force.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 3
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 15m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: Through sheer willpower, you summon an invisible mental force and use it to shove a target in line-of-sight. The target must immediately make a successful DN 4 Agility Test or is knocked Prone, possibly incurring additional consequences depending upon their situation at the time.

Potency: [1] Range is increased by 15m. [2] Agility Test DN increased by 1.

otherworldly_voices.name: Otherworldly Voices
otherworldly_voices.description:
Discipline: Minor
DN: 3
XP Cost: 5
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 25m
Keywords: AUDITORY, PSYCHIC

Effect: You mould the cacophonous sounds of the Warp into a tool for your own purposes, causing ghostly voices or other sounds to appear from places or objects within line of sight and in range. These voices or sounds have an echoing, otherworldly quality to them, and cannot rise in volume above a typical conversational tone. These sounds are usually used to unnerve or distract others, but they can also be used to convey information to distant targets, though such communication is one-way and disturbing in nature.

Potency: [1] Range is increased by 25m. [2]* Volume of voices and sounds increased to level of a shout.

enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
enfeeble.description:
Discipline: Biomancy
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: The air grows thick and sticky as you open a slight tear in the fabric of reality to drain away the life of your enemies. The target's Strength is reduced by 1 and they suffer 1 Shock at the beginning of each of their turns while the power is sustained. Once the power ends, the target regains their lost Strength.

Potency: [1] +1 Strength reduction. [3] +1 Shock damage per Round.

life_leech.name: Life Leech
life_leech.description:
Discipline: Biomancy
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: The air chills around you as you draw the life from your enemy in ephemeral wisps. The target suffers 1d6 Shock and 1d3 Wounds. You heal an amount of Shock and Wounds equal to half the amount inflicted on the target.

Potency: [1] +1 Shock. [2] +1 Wound. [3]* Damage is Mortal Wounds.

warp_speed.name: Warp Speed
warp_speed.description:
Discipline: Biomancy
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: Your form begins to distort and grow fuzzy as you draw energy from the Warp and transfer it straight into your own limbs. While you sustain this power your Speed is doubled, you may take one additional Action per round at no penalty (which can be an attack), your Defence increases by +1, and you act first in every Round. Warp Speed taxes a Psyker physically. You suffer 1d3+1 Shock for every Round you sustain the power.

Potency: [1]* Suffer 1 less Shock when for sustaining this power. [2] +1 bonus to Defence.

phantom_form.name: Phantom Form
phantom_form.description:
Discipline: Biomancy
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: The light surrounding you grows dim, then so does your body, transformed into a wispy phantom. While you sustain the power, you can pass freely through solid objects of any kind, though your Speed is reduced by half. In effect, you become a phantom, a being out of phase with reality. While you can both see and be seen by the real world, you cannot physically interact with it in any way. Phantom Form is extremely taxing to the spirit. You suffer 1 Shock for every round you sustain the power. Should you revert to your normal form while passing through hazardous conditions, you immediately suffer the consequences of those conditions. If you revert to your true form while passing through a solid object, you appear at a random open space next to the object and suffer 1d6 Mortal Wounds.

Potency: [1]* Your Speed is normal. [1]* Your speech can be heard. [3]* You can interact with objects as a Full Round Action.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description:
Discipline: Biomancy
DN: 8
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: Your body is an extension of the Warp itself. You are one and the same, and master of both. Once activated, you can use this power to heal injuries at a phenomenal rate, and, in time, even regrow lost limbs or body parts. While this power is sustained, you heal 1 Wound per Round. If you are at maximum Wounds, you heal 1 Shock per round. If you are at maximum Shock and Wounds, you may regenerate whole body parts, though this process is much slower. A smaller body part, such as a finger or eye, can be regenerated in an hour, but regenerating a whole limb takes an entire day (sustaining the power for so long will leave you Exhausted).

Potency: [1] +1 Shock healed per round. [2] +1 Wound healed per round.

shape_flesh.name: Shape Flesh
shape_flesh.description: Effect text should include before listing body modifications: 'Some of these modifications are obviously visible and likely grotesque, and those who see them will likely view them as mutations.'

forewarning.name: Forewarning
forewarning.description:
Discipline: Divination
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: 1 Combat
Range: Self
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You fall into a brief reverie, peering into the immediate future to see how events of a specific encounter will unfold. You pay heed to how your enemies fight and what actions they will take, so that armed with this knowledge, you may better protect against their attacks. While activated, you may Seize the Initiative without spending Glory once during the combat you are currently engaged in or your next combat, and you gain a +1 bonus to your Defence in the combat you are currently engaged in or your next combat.

Potency: [1]* Activation reduced to an Action. [2] +1 bonus to Defence.

prescience.name: Prescience
prescience.description: Effect text should include the parenthetical: "(i.e. meaning that if no 1s were rolled on a Wrath Dice of the Psychic test, it would still count as 1 Wrath Dice showing a 1 and require a roll on the Perils of the Warp table)"

misfortune.name: Misfortune
misfortune.description:
Discipline: Divination
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 30m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You fall into a brief reverie, peering into the immediate future of a specific enemy, and then manipulate the threads of that future so that the most awful outcomes prevail. The target immediately becomes Vulnerable (1) and Hindered (1) for as long as the power is sustained. Misfortune is mentally draining. You suffer 1 Shock for every minute you sustain the power.

Potency: [1]* Time to Activate reduced to an Action. [2] Target has a -1 penalty to Defence. [2] Target has +1DN to ability tests.

psychometry.name: Psychometry
psychometry.description: Effect text should include after 'enter your senses': ', for example the sour-steel taste of murderous rage or the pungent, decaying stench of regret.'

scriers_gaze.name: Scrier's Gaze
scriers_gaze.description:
Discipline: Divination
DN: 6
XP Cost: 5
Activation: Full-Round Action (or 10 minutes)
Duration: Sustained
Range: 5,000m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You project your mind remotely to view events occurring in another place within range. You must be aware of the location to view it, and must have at least a general idea of where it is in relation to yourself. If you are not exactly aware of these conditions, you must spend 10 minutes to hone in on the location. You can sustain Scrier's Gaze to view the targeted location, but while doing so you cannot move or perform any other actions and are completely oblivious to your own surroundings. Scrier's Gaze is mentally taxing. You suffer 1 Shock for every 10 minutes you sustain the power. You may not recover Shock while sustaining this power.

Potency: [1] Range increased by a factor of 10.

fiery_form.name: Fiery Form
fiery_form.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You burst into flame, your body engulfed in a roaring inferno. These flames cause no harm to you or your possessions. While this power is sustained, all creatures within 2m of you immediately take 10+1 ED damage, and take this damage again at the end of each of their own Turns they remain in range. You gain a +1 bonus to your Defence and are immune to all damage or effects with the FIRE or MELTA Keywords.

Potency: [2] +1 ED damage. [3] +1 Defence.

flame_breath.name: Flame Breath
flame_breath.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: 5
XP Cost: 5
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You spew a gout of warpfire. Your Flaming Breath fills a line 5m in front of you and is treated as having the Flamer Trait.

Potency: [1] +1 ED damage. [1] Arc the Flame Breath (Wil) metres.

mindfire.name: Mindfire
mindfire.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: Target's Willpower
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 100m
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You subtly raise the internal temperature of your target's body. As the temperature rises they experience intense discomfort and their body falters. Your target must be within in line of sight to activate this power. If you succeed, you raise the target's internal temperature and they are Hindered. In order to Sustain this power you must win an Opposed Willpower Test against your target at the start of each of your turns. Whilst this power is affecting a target, the effects of extreme cold may be reduced or ignored at the GM's discretion.

Potency: [1] Increase target's level of Hindered by 1. [3]* Target is Exhausted.

molten_beam.name: Molten Beam
molten_beam.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 10m
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You stretch forth your open hand and release a beam of blindingly bright energy at your foes. This extremely hot beam of raw power melts even the hardest metals to slag, and the air close to the beam's passage catches fire. The beam instantly travels along a straight line for 10m in a direction you choose. Targets struck by the beam suffer 18+2 ED damage and must pass a DN 4 Initiative Test or be set On Fire.

Potency: [2] +1 ED damage. [1]* +10m range.

spontaneous_combustion.name: Spontaneous Combustion
spontaneous_combustion.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 20m
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You focus your rage, eyes glowing with Warpfire, until your enemies burst into flame. Targets hit with this power suffer 12+1 ED damage and must make a successful DN 4 Agility Test to avoid being set On Fire.

Potency: [2] +1 ED damage. [1] +10m range.

wall_of_flame.name: Wall of Flame
wall_of_flame.description:
Discipline: Pyromancy
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: You throw your arms wide and channel the seething energies of the Warp, conjuring a wall of flames. Initially, you may freely shape this fiery wall as you please, though its dimensions have limits - up to 3m wide, 20m long and 10m high. You can summon the Wall of Flame anywhere within range and line of sight, including the space occupied by living creatures. Once the wall has been summoned, its dimensions cannot be altered, and it burns without fuel for as long as you sustain it. Creatures that attempt to pass through the Wall of Flame or that are caught inside it when it is summoned immediately take 12+1 ED damage and are On Fire. Creatures within 2m immediately take 10+1 ED damage when the wall is summoned, and again each turn they end within 2m of the wall.

Potency: [2] +1 ED damage. [2]* You may use a Move Action to reshape the wall of flame once while it is Sustained. [1] +1m in height or length.

assail.name: Assail
assail.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 20m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: Eyes blazing with inner light, you use nothing more than the power of your will to uproot a boulder, tree, or similarly large object in the vicinity, and smite your enemies with it. Targets hit by this power suffer 10+1 ED damage.

Potency: [1] +1ED damage. [2] +10m range.

crush.name: Crush
crush.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You clamp an invisible force around your enemy, and tighten it to crush them. If successfully activated, the target takes 10+1 ED damage and must make a successful DN 5 Strength or Willpower Test (their choice) or be Restrained. While Restrained, the target can do nothing on their turn except try to break free by again making another Strength or Willpower Test as a Full-Round Action. If the victim does not escape, they take an additional 10+1 ED at the beginning of each of your turns for as long as you Sustain the power.

Potency: [3] +1 ED damage. The increased damage applies to the continual damage each turn. [2] +1 DN to the Strength or Willpower Test.

levitation.name: Levitation
levitation.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: 5
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: Your hair and garments are blown fiercely by ethereal forces as you rise off the ground. You can fly freely at your normal Speed while you sustain this power. Levitation is mentally taxing. You suffer 1 Shock for every hour you sustain the power.

Potency: [1] Flying Speed increases by 5m. [2] +1 Strength for determining what you may carry while flying.

telekinetic_dome.name: Telekinetic Dome
telekinetic_dome.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You draw the inert energies floating all around you and fashion an invisible barrier of force to protect yourself from harm. You gain +2 Resilience and may roll Determination against Mortal Wounds while you sustain this power. Telekinetic Dome is mentally taxing. You suffer 1 Shock for every minute you sustain the power.

Potency: [2]* Increase range to +Rank m, and all beings in range gain the same protection. [2] Increase bonus to Resilience by +1.

grav_warp.name: Grav-Warp
grav_warp.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: Target's Willpower +2
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 50m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: You exploit the pressures of the Warp, exerting a force much like gravity on your target. Make an Opposed Willpower Test with a single target in line of sight to activate this power. If you succeed, you can choose to inflict one of the following effects on the target: Increase Gravity: Your target is Prone and Restrained. Change Gravity: Choose a direction; gravity now acts in that direction for the target. If you Sustain this power, you may choose another effect - such as increasing gravity after changing it - or change the direction of gravity for the target again. Whenever you stop sustaining this power or the target moves more than 50m away, the power no longer affects the target. The gravity the target is subjected to is equivalent to Terran standard. This may cause them to take damage from falling. If your target is an object, the DN is determined by the object's size and weight.

Potency: [2] Inflict 1 Mortal Wound to the target. [3] Increase Range by +50m.

shock_wave.name: Shock Wave
shock_wave.description:
Discipline: Telekinesis
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: KINETIC, PSYCHIC

Effect: With a mighty thrust of your fist, you unleash a burst of mental force that blasts from you in all directions. All creatures within range take 12+1 ED damage from this blast and must make a successful DN 5 Agility Test or be thrown to the ground Prone.

Potency: [1] Range is increased by 5m. [2] +1ED damage.

erasure.name: Erasure
erasure.description:
Discipline: Telepathy
DN: Target's Willpower +2
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 30m
Keywords: TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: You remove a memory from your target's mind, casting it off to be lost in the Warp forever. If you successfully activate this power you may remove a recent memory from the target's mind. You may only remove a number of hours of the target's memory equal to your Rank, and cannot remove memories from more than 24 hours before this power was used. The target is aware of the gap in their recollections, but the memories have been fully removed from their psyche and cannot be recovered.

Potency: [2] +30m range. [3] Double the length of the memory that can be removed.

fog_the_mind.name: Fog the Mind
fog_the_mind.description:
Discipline: Telepathy
DN: 4
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: You reach into your enemy's mind and cloud their thoughts, slowing their cognitive processes and dulling their wits.
